Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Albeit \Al`be"it\, conj. [OE. al be although it be, where al is our all. Cf. {Although}.] Even though; although; notwithstanding. --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
Albeit so masked, Madam, I love the truth. --Tennyson. [1913 Webster]
